name: Arcade Volleyball - Pixel Prototype Week 2
description:
Controls:

P1: ESDF to move,  Left Shift to jump

P2: Arrows to move, N to jump

Made in one week in Bennett Foddy's Pixel Prototype Studio class at NYU.

This week's assignment: clone one game from a selection of classic arcade games. I chose Arcade Volleyball.

Read more about the development here.
